title: SemEval 2023 Task 9: Multilingual Tweet Intimacy Analysis
abstract: We propose MINT, a new Multilingual INTimacy analysis dataset covering 13,372 tweets in 10 languages including English, French, Spanish, Italian, Portuguese, Korean, Dutch, Chinese, Hindi, and Arabic. We benchmarked a list of popular multilingual pre-trained language models. The dataset is released along with the SemEval 2023 Task 9: Multilingual Tweet Intimacy Analysis (https://sites.google.com/umich.edu/semeval-2023-tweet-intimacy).
